exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall src dst zero : pos n, src <> dst -> src <> zero -> dst <> zero -> forall (i : nat) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), v#>dst = 0 -> v#>zero = 0 -> st = (4 + i, v[0/src][(2 * (v#>src))/dst]) -> (i, mm_mul2 src dst zero i) // (i, v) -+> st" on hypothesis of type "v#>src = stack_enc s".

exceptions.tactic: apply mm_push_Zero with (s := s) in H4; auto.

original: intros. intros H1 H2 H3 H4. apply mm_mul2_progress in H1; auto. apply mm_push_Zero with (s := s) in H4; auto. apply mm_transfert_progress in H2; auto. apply mm_steps_DEC_0_inv in H3; auto. destruct H1 as [? ?]. destruct H2 as [? ?]. destruct H3 as [? ?]. rewrite H0, H, H5. auto.
